content:
The Streaming Channel API type uses the Streaming API to send notifications of general events that aren't tied to Salesforce data changes. Use the Streaming Channel API when you want to send and receive notifications based on custom events that you specify.

For example, use the Streaming Channel data source for a Chat application for the users in your org.

Configure a Streaming Channel data source on your FlexCard.

Enable the Streaming Channel data source to send and receive notifications based on custom events that you specify. The Streaming Channel API type enables the Streaming API to send notifications of general events that arenâ€™t tied to Salesforce data changes.

Configure a Streaming Channel Data Source on a FlexCard
The Streaming Channel API is also known as Generic Streaming in Salesforce. See Generic Streaming.
title: Streaming Channel Data Source
